alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; Lower Clark Fork Region; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 8:06PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of Lake, north central Missoula, east central Sanders, south central Flathead and northwestern Powell Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 904 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking intense snow showers along a line extending from 10 miles south of Swan Lake to 11 miles north of Plains. Movement was east to southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-quarter mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Roads may quickly become snow covered and slick. Locations impacted include... Polson, Ronan, Pablo, Jette, Turtle Lake, Kings Point, Rocky Point, Kerr, Big Arm, Hot Springs, Round Butte, Condon, Elmo, Finley Point, Niarada, Dayton, Lonepine, Camas Prairie, Salmon Prairie and Camas. This includes the following highways... Highway 83 between mile markers 41 and 67. Highway 93 N between mile markers 42 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
